verses.verse: Again it came to pass on the <S%H3117>day<s%> when the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3320>present<s%> themselves before <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that <S%H7854>Satan<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> also <S%H8432>among<s%> them to <S%H3320>present<s%> himself before <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7854>Satan<s%>, Hast <S%H7760>thou<s%> <S%H3820>considered<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%>? for there is none like him in the <S%H776>earth<s%>, a <S%H8535>perfect<s%> and an <S%H3477>upright<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, one that <S%H3373>feareth<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H5493>turneth<s%> away from <S%H7451>evil<s%>: and he still holdeth <S%H2388>fast<s%> his <S%H8538>integrity<s%>, although thou <S%H5496>movedst<s%> me against <S%H1104>him<s%>, to destroy him without <S%H2600>cause<s%>.

And <S%H7854>Satan<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5785>Skin<s%> for <S%H5785>skin<s%>, <S%H376>yea<s%>, all that a man hath will he <S%H5414>give<s%> for his <S%H5315>life<s%>.

But <S%H199><s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5060>now<s%>, and touch his <S%H6106>bone<s%> and his <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and he will <S%H1288>renounce<s%> thee to thy <S%H6440>face<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7854>Satan<s%>, <S%H3027>Behold<s%>, he is in thy hand; only <S%H8104>spare<s%> his <S%H5315>life<s%>.

So <S%H7854>Satan<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> with <S%H7451>sore<s%> <S%H7822>boils<s%> from the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of his <S%H7272>foot<s%> unto his <S%H6936>crown<s%>.
And he <S%H3947>took<s%> him a <S%H2789>potsherd<s%> to <S%H1623>scrape<s%> himself <S%H3427>therewith<s%>; and he sat <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H665>ashes<s%>.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> unto <S%H2388>him<s%>, Dost thou still hold fast thine <S%H8538>integrity<s%>? <S%H1288>renounce<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H4191>die<s%>.

But he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1696>her<s%>, Thou speakest as <S%H259>one<s%> of the foolish <S%H5036>women<s%> <S%H1696>speaketh<s%>. <S%H1571>What<s%>? shall we <S%H6901>receive<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> at the hand of <S%H430>God<s%>, and shall we not <S%H6901>receive<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>? In all this did not <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> with his <S%H8193>lips<s%>.

Now when <S%H347>Job<s%>'s <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7453>friends<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of all this <S%H7451>evil<s%> that was <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H935>him<s%>, they came every <S%H376>one<s%> from his own <S%H4725>place<s%>: <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite<s%>, and <S%H1085>Bildad<s%> the <S%H7747>Shuhite<s%>, and <S%H6691>Zophar<s%> the <S%H5284>Naamathite<s%>, and they made an <S%H3259>appointment<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5110>bemoan<s%> him and to comfort <S%H5162>him<s%>.

And when they lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> afar <S%H7350>off<s%>, and <S%H5234>knew<s%> him <S%H5375>not<s%>, they lifted up their <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and <S%H1058>wept<s%>; and they <S%H7167>rent<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H4598>robe<s%>, and <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%> upon their <S%H7218>heads<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.

So they sat <S%H3427>down<s%> with him upon the <S%H776>ground<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%>, and none <S%H1696>spake<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> unto <S%H7200>him<s%>: for they saw that his <S%H3511>grief<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1431>great<s%>.
